title: The Security Council
creator_credit: United Nations. Office of Public Information and V.R. Sarma
brief_description: Explains the Council’s powers, membership and procedure in dealing with international crises. Describes its action in Indonesia, Israel, Korea and the Congo. Emphasises its primary task of keeping the peace
creator_credit_for_label: United Nations. Office of Public Information and V.R. Sarma
